Transcription for 1221151

In the early day when I first came here we used to go to the clubs in Cardiff and I had a mohair suit.
Well they didn't know what a mohair suit was.
Three button mohair suit with a split in the back. Jack the Lad. That was my personality.
Handmade. They used to have all my suits made. Never went anywhere to buy them off the peg.
And we were like a little bit out of the ordinary here.
And it was easy peasy with all the girls because we were so different.
Me and a couple of the boys that worked with me.
